channel.title: Server run problem
channel.description:
When i try running server this comes up... [6/2/11 9:18 PM]: Launching Runefx... [6/2/11 9:18 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [6/2/11 9:18 PM]: java.net.BindExce ption: Address already in use: bind [6/2/11 9:18 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [6/2/11 9:18 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(ServerSocketC hannelImpl.java:119) [6/2/11 9:18 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(ServerSocketAdapt or.java:59) [6/2/11 9:18 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [6/2/11 9:18 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [6/2/11 9:18 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [6/2/11 9:18 PM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [6/2/11 9:18 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Press any key to continue . . .
And I got the server from.. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,492527.0.html
MSN: mt12094@hotmail.com - just incase :P Thank's very much!.

item.title: Server run problem

@flame255 wrote:

item.title: Server run problem
item.dc:creator: @xX_CoDeR_AJ xX CoDeR AJ
item.description:
@xX_CoDeR_AJ wrote:

Because what MySQL does is stores data, pretty much it’s used to make highscores. and a lot of other features. It’s good to have but if you dont know how to work it, it’s pointless to have it.

Read full topic
